name: Simple Todo
description: A web application and Google Chrome extension that replaces the new tab page with a simple todo list.

name: Google Mee PiP
description: A Google Chrome extension that displays a selected Google Meet participant's video in a Picture-in-Picture window.

name: Figma Dot Grid Plugin
description: Figma plugin to easily generate dot grids for your Figma designs.

name: Houdini Paint Dot Grid
description: Draw dot grid backgrounds using CSS Paint API.

name: Snippets
description: A Web application for hosting code snippets online. Inspired by putco.de.

name: parcel-plugin-data-src
description: A Parcel.js plugin to bundle resources defined in data-src and data-srcset attributes.

name: sublime-open-in-git-repository
description: Sublime Text plugin for opening the remote git url for the current file.

name: mdi-cli
description: A command-line tool for generating Material Design icons.

name: vue-intersect
description: A Vue.js plugin that reports element intersections using the IntersectionObserver API.

name: Endpoints
description: Built the frontend of a Web application for creating URL endpoints with customizable responses, useful as dummy APIs when developing other applications.

name: gulp-extract-static
description: Gulp plugin for extracting static resource paths from templates.

name: Streaks
description: A Web application for tracking habits using a GitHub-like calendar chart. All data is stored locally on the browser.

name: hermes
description: Client-side messaging channel for sending data from one browser tab to another.

name: UP Cebu Intrams Scoreboard
description: Scoreboard website for UP Cebu's Intramurals.

name: trex-runner
description: Chromium's offline T-rex game extracted from the Chromium repository.

name: wifi-cli
description: Manage wireless network connections from the command line.

name: imgur-upload-cli
description: Upload images to imgur.com from the command line.

name: devcomic
description: Get latest dev comics from several comic sites.

name: speech-simsimi
description: Interact with SimSimi chatbot using the Speech Recognition and Speech Synthesis APIs.

name: prettylogger
description: Logs things (dicts, tuples, lists, etc.) in color and beutiful format.

name: subdicts
description: A small Python utility which parses nested keys in dictionaries into sub-dictionaries.

name: automata
description: Regular Expression parser and Non-Deterministic/Deterministic Finite Automaton Constructor.
